titleStmt.title: Act of the Committe of Estates of Parliament: for prorogating the monethly maintenance for the four moneths of October, November, and December 1648. and January 1649. And for the proportionall retention of the annual-rents during that time.
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Convention of Estates.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in: National Library of Scotland.
